name: James Clear
what_you_do: Author and speaker focused on habits, decision-making, and continuous improvement.
who_you_serve: Individuals seeking to build good habits and break bad ones.
social_proof: #1 New York Times bestselling author; Atomic Habits has sold more than 25 million copies worldwide; featured in Time magazine, the New York Times, the Wall Street Journal, and on CBS This Morning.
signature_programs: Atomic Habits (book), Atoms (official Atomic Habits app), 30 Days to Better Habits (free email course), 3-2-1 Newsletter, MasterClass, Habit Journal
business_focus: Teaching individuals how to build good habits and achieve continuous improvement through books, courses, and speaking.
service_provided: Books, mobile app, free email course, newsletter, speaking engagements, MasterClass, habit journal
